metadata.title: CVE-2024-2609 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The permission prompt input delay could expire while the window is not infocus. This makes it vulnerable to clickjacking by malicious websites. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 124, Firefox ESR < 115.10, and Thunderbird< 115.10.

criterions.comment: mozjs38: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
